greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into parts having in decimal representation the same digital root as n has.
comment: A156145 and A017173 give record values and where they occur: a(A017173(n-1))=A156145(n);
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
program: p ks'@(k:ks) m = if m < k then 0 else p ks' (m - k) + p ks m
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 05 2009
